product_name: Big Agnes Hog Park Sleeping Bag
long_description: From the Big Agnes Park Series, the synthetic Hog Park sleeping bag offers big guys and campers who like a lot of space supreme comfort at base camp and during car-camping excursions. Underside insulation has been eliminated and replaced with a sleeve for a 25-in.-wide pad, sold separately. Quallofil(TM) synthetic insulation works a lot like down, with minimal bulkiness and excellent packability, yet provides warmth even when wet. Semirectangular-shape bag has a durable ripstop nylon shell with Durable Water Repellent finish and soft cotton/polyester lining. No-draft yoke collar extends down from the top of the bag, sealing around the neck to prevent warm air from escaping and cold air from entering. The Hog Park +20degF sleeping bag features a draft tube behind the zipper to prevent cold air from seeping inside. Oversized draft wedge insulates the connection between the bag and pad to prevent cold air from entering. Built-in pillow sleeve allows you to stuff in a jacket or other clothing for a stay-in-place pillow. Bag will zip to another bag with opposite zipper configuration. Interior fabric loops stabilize a sleeping bag liner, sold separately. Big Agnes Hog Park +20degF sleeping bag includes a nylon stuff sack.
